text:
Bug 48501 (https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48501) added log rotation to the isapi redirector.

This was fixed for 1.2.31, yet has no fixed version (as this has no reported version; it isn't an option in bugzilla).

Moreover, the change log does not link to this ticket (it merely states "IIS: Added rotatelogs style log rotation to ISAPI Redirector. (timw)")

And most importantly of all, the reference documentation (http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/reference/iis.html) is not archived, and *does not* indicate that log_rotationtime and log_filesize are only available "from 1.2.31". These two words would have saved a coworker a few hours of frustration...
creator: stephen.kestle@orionhealth.com

text:
This has been fixed in trunk and will be included in 1.2.32 onwards.

Note that the docs on the Tomcat website always reflect the latest released version so these changes will not appear until 1.2.32 is released.
creator: markt@apache.org
